content.detailedDescription:
"i had gotten up to get a glass of water around 5 in the morning and i noticed something looking out my window. it was just that one and it was bright, moved fast looked like a star but moved back and forth like it was lost at first. i thought it was the satellite but i've seen those fly by and that wasn't it.
it stayed in the same area but it being my first time seeing something like this i kinda freaked and didn't wait to see where it went.
but it was in the sky northwest old tucson
at first i thought maybe it was a plane as well but no blinking lights like a helicopter or air plane... solid bright light that moved really fast
back and forth. the outline was was like a triangle but the middle was bright."
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: " it was bright moved fast looked like a star but moved back and forth like it was lost."

content.detailedDescription: I have become a bit of a skywatcher, and have seen many odd things in the last year, but i have never seen a triangle-type craft, until i reviewed the footage from my modified 'ghost'-pro (a full-spectrum night vision camera), that i had collected on july 12-13 2016. although i expected a possible few meteors, i caught 2 hours of some of the most anomalous lights i had ever seen. my camera is tripod mounted, and i keep a known uv light source in frame; it's a security camera mounted on the corner of the roof on the 2cnd story. that way i can review the security camera, if i believe the ghost-pro has been moved. the video will show the event, un-retouched, then enhanced video/stills. i will continue to report the night vision anomalies, as they happen
content.summary: Anomalous lights, triangle craft & 'space'-cloud caught on night vision 7/12/16

content.detailedDescription:
Late one afternoon, i think it was friday, june 29, 2016, a thunderstorm was brewing so i grabbed my digital camera to take several pictures of the clouds. the second picture i took had streaks of light that shot through my field of vision just as i clicked the shutter. i almost deleted it, but was glad i didn't. 

it was probably around 6-7 pm est, on my deck which is facing southeast and looking at the clouds across the street. i'm always on the lookout for tornado-looking clouds and these looked like that, low, flat, very dark gray, and whitish underneath. these three bright beams of light startled me as they streaked across my eyes as i looked in the camera and was pushing the button down at the same time. 

they seemed to originate from underneath the clouds, so i don't think they could be from a car on the ground, or a street light, as they were too high up. i've had a few other people look at the photo and they don't know what the streaks are either. 

maybe you all can tell me what they are.
content.summary: I was photographing storm clouds and these three beams of light shot across my field of vision as i clicked the shutter.

content.detailedDescription:
Adjuntas puerto rico, july 14 of 2016, 12:19 am, near 518 road.  
ufo of no more than 25´, was hovering stationary and sometimes, made some zig zags and spirals short moves.  the event last like 40 minutes or more.  the ufo was round like a plate with a circular light from left to right, showing red, blue-green and yellow-orange colors.  during all that time, two commercial airplanes pass separatedly.  in the two separated moments, the ufo turns off the multicolor circular light, did not move and just left a white stationary light.  when they went far away, the ufo turn on again the multicolor circular lights.  it was above a mountain, near of the top trees and a main line of electricity cable.
content.summary: Stationary ufo with some shorts zig zag and spiral motions at the same area, for 40 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: i was on indian creek dr. which was on the same road i take to the havins unit where i work as a correction officer. i was on my way to my house on break when i saw this triangular, silver, flying object. it had pulsating lights on the side which i saw as it hovered over my car. my radio was statically , so i turned it off. i opened my windows to listen for any noise that the radio might have drowned out , i bent down as it started to move towards the east thinking it might crash since it was so close to the ground. i watched as it moved slowly over the trees , then without a sound it was gone. i tried to call 911 on my cell phone but i don't know if it was because i was so jittery or it was controlled by some unknown cause. i live less than 5 minutes from my unit where i work, so i called 911 from my home. i explained what i observed and told the operator that the object could be a small plane but i thought i saw a ufo. i explained that i was a correction officer and that i would soon be going back to my unit after i returned from break.I called central office and told them to be expecting sheriff officers to talk with me. she laughed it off, when i returned everyone knew what i had seen and that i called 911, they all laughed at me and no one from the sheriffs office ever showed up. i endured a lot of jokes and was made fun of for years. i saw that ufo head east , toward the brownwood national guard unit . i know what i saw even though no one believes me , it scares me today because i know they are out there.
content.summary: I was a corrections officer headed home on my break when i observered a triangular object flying low to the ground. it had pulsating lights, had no sound but it was headed towards the national guard base. when i tried to call 911 , my cell phone wouldn't

content.detailedDescription:
1: i was in zermatt with my mom and i wanted to see the stars at night, so we walked out to the outskirts of town with her and my friend who was also staying at the hotel with us. (who i will call d). the three of us walked to the outskirts of town on a dirt path and i decided to sit down and look at the stars.

2: there was a blue flash out of the corner of my eye to the left of me (towards an unlit farm pasture), no sound like a camera flash and no movement of any kind came from that direction. i looked over to my left, then up above me where i saw the ufo.

3: at first i thought that it was an airplane, but when it started getting brighter/ coming closer i realized that it was no aircraft

4: the object approached from the left side, slightly further ahead of where the flash came from, it had bright white lights/ a light shining from it, but it didn't light up anything around me. there was no noise like an airplane or a helicopter, and no lights like either of those neither. it came about 25-50 feet away from us and began glowing brighter, i believed it was coming closer and got spooked, but my mom kept on observing it. before i ran off i saw it change directions, get dimmer again, and begin heading over to my right. 

5: when i saw it, i was a first confused, but i quickly became scared, i felt like something wasn't right and i ran a little ways down the dirt path, but i have low stamina and quickly came to a stop. my mom joined up with me, i rember asking her about it, specifically how it was 'wobbling' and how 'bright it was. 'd' did not seem to see it, or hear anything.

6: i lost sight of the object when i got scared and ran off
content.summary: Bright, soundless, white light, got closer, sudden turn, flew over us

content.detailedDescription: Watching spacetv with my son, saw coming from top side of earth on video, found camera and started to video, so only caught from there, fourth day watching so didn't expect to have on hand, forgot had till saw video from the 9th, and looked familiar.  went through and found video, from the 18th of june at around 0305 mountain.  can see the path from below for about two and half mins, then can see turning then zooming out into darkness, thought might possibly a satellite but then stopped and turned then took off, wow!!!!
content.summary: Came from earth, got phone out to video, change direction then zooms out

content.detailedDescription: Saturday afternoon. relaxing on hammock and noticed bright object in sky, bright light like airplane then got dull, disappeared then appeared bright again. moved very slowly going north bound. left to get binoculars and found object again. through binoculars it appeared like a small cone shape or round, the reflection/brightness of light would not let me get a real good luck. when it would get dull (no longer bright) it appeared the object was long like a short pencil in a vertical position. i also spotted a white orb moving by it. i decided to keep focused on the shinny object and the orb left my view from the binoculars. i called my daughter who also saw a white object slowly move and appear/disappear. this event lasted a full 20 min. at least.  that is my report.
content.summary: Bright object in sky then get dull get bright again moved slowly north

content.detailedDescription: I woke in the middle of the night and looked up to a cloudless sky. i was familiar with the stars and constellation patterns at this time of the night, and i was extremely surprised to find what seemed to be an entirely new constellation. at first the figure was just a line of lights in the sky, like stars in a row, but then the "star" on the farthest left side of the arrangement moved, touched the craft to its right, and then that craft began to move to the right and touch the next one. this sequence continued for all 12 objects observed until the last one was touched, moved right, and then the figure halted again just as it had been. it was almost like witnessing how a centipede's legs move, but on an astrological scale. very strange. the pattern the faded away slowly, like a balloon does when it gets so far into the atmosphere that it becomes difficult to see, then disappears completely.
content.summary: Path of about 12  lights traveling in a straight path and interacting with each other.

content.detailedDescription: Our friend had to be home by 10 pm, or he would not be allowed to visit us for a week. so my sister and our friend and i jumped in our boat at 9:50 pm. we drove north to our friends home and got him home in time. then we headed south to go back home. when we left his cove we saw the disc to the south and headed southeast around the small island. we came around the island and it was there hanging in the sky, no sound no movement. my sister cut the engine and we both crawled under the dashboard afraid. as our boat drifted almost underneath we looked up at the disc. it was very large and had long rectangular lights that went all the way around the entire perimeter of the craft. they were all the colors of the rainbow and when one would turn on the one behind would go dim,and then the next light would go on and the previous light would go dim. it appeared to be rotating,but it was the pattern of the lights going on and off repeatedly. the disc then disappeared and we drove into our dock,shocked and terrified, afraid of seeing something we might not have been supposed to see.
content.summary: We took our boat to bring a friend home. returning we saw a disc shaped craft above us. we watched a light show for 5 minutes it then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Flying drone aircraft.  post production video captured two separate events. both events object flew directly at aircraft on an intercept course.  i have several such events recorded. these things display actions suggesting under intelligent control. there are so many of these things in my area that every time i throw my drone up into the air, it comes back with ufo video on it.    i need an e-mail address to send this video as i don't know how to transfer file to this web sight.  call - e- mail or something so i may receive information on how to give you this video.
content.summary: Baseball size cloud took off from tree top and changing direction to intercept drone at speeds calculated at near mach 1.

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on market st in johnsonburg a witness saw one light in the sky that they assumed was a planet. the car was pulled over once the light was observed to be moving. once out of the car two more lights were seen around the same elevation. tried to take a video or the orbs but the orbs were blinking in and out on the camera screen, but were solid when viewing without the camera. the orbs were observed for a few minutes and then one orb stayed stationary and the other two moved orbs moved to the stationary orb and the moment they all came together they just blinked out
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: Dos esferas de luz, a unos 200 metros de altura, velocidad constante y en paralelo. tamaño aproximado de unos entre 4 y 8 metros de diametro, viajando desde el este al oeste, cruzaron por encima de donde estaba situado.
content.summary: Dos esferas de luz paralelas.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on hwy 7 from work one evening and seen a beautiful sunset, so i pulled over to the side of the road and rolled down my window.  i just started taking pictures and did not even see anything there, i am actually surprised i didn't notice it.  

well about a week or so later i wanted to show my friends the beautiful pictures that i got of the sunset and i then noticed this green little circle with white little dots in it on the ground it looked like at first.  then i started looking at the other pictures and this object is in every picture but one when it turned around in the sky.

i did have my window rolled down so it could not be a glare off that or off my phone because i have looked at all my other pictures at sunset and have not seen that before.  i am not sure what it is but i sure would like to find out.  it looks so cool.

my feelings after the sight sure was amazed.  i sure wish i would have noticed it before because then maybe i could have gotten more pictures.  

i do hope to hear from you soon on what this object may be.

i have 17 pictures of this event and could only attach 10.  i am not quit sure what to do.  if you could email me or call and let me know how to send you the other ones then i will do it as soon as i can.
content.summary: I am a photographer and love taking sunset or sunrise pictures and seen a beautiful sunset on the way home.  i took 17 pictures and did not look at them until 1 week later with some friends and seen this green little object throughout all the pictues.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on hwy 7 from work one evening and seen a beautiful sunset, so i pulled over to the side of the road and rolled down my window.  i just started taking pictures and did not even see anything there, i am actually surprised i didn't notice it.  

well about a week or so later i wanted to show my friends the beautiful pictures that i got of the sunset and i then noticed this green little circle with white little dots in it on the ground it looked like at first.  then i started looking at the other pictures and this object is in every picture but one when it turned around in the sky.

i did have my window rolled down so it could not be a glare off that or off my phone because i have looked at all my other pictures at sunset and have not seen that before.  i am not sure what it is but i sure would like to find out.  it looks so cool.

my feelings after the sight sure was amazed.  i sure wish i would have noticed it before because then maybe i could have gotten more pictures.  

i do hope to hear from you soon on what this object may be.

i have 17 pictures of this event and could only attach 10.  i am not quit sure what to do.  if you could email me or call and let me know how to send you the other ones then i will do it as soon as i can.
content.summary: I am a photographer and love taking sunset or sunrise pictures and seen a beautiful sunset on the way home.  i took 17 pictures and did not look at them until 1 week later with some friends and seen this green little object throughout all the pictues.

content.detailedDescription:
We where observing the aurora as we are aurora tour guides  for www.Chasethelighttours.Co.Uk/marianne's heaven on earth aurora chaser tours,/m.H.O.E.A.C.T.
we seen unusal object, seamed to touch aurora and re -fuel there as if it got energy by touching it 
we though it was a ufo
wow whats that did you catch it we said to each other
when it disappeared it was gone.
this was one of many sightings while aurora hunting in the past 5 years in this area.
content.summary: Hovered seamed to fuel with touching the aurora then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed bright red randomly flashing object moving at a high rate of speed. it had a short cone shaped contrail. the object seemed to be well above 20,000 ft but appeared large.
content.summary: Observed very bright flashing red object moving at a high rate of speed with a short cone shaped contrail.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and facing east at a bus stop, when i noticed an emerald mixed with blueish object sparkling high in the sky over mount lassen, and pulsating in the same spot for several minutes. i observed it moving very slowly toward the north, and it would periodically stop, going in and out of visibility and changing directions. it appeared to have a dark color at it's core, but was brilliant and pulsating an emerald light. i then noticed a black object that looked like a flying saucer(seriously!) move from the spot of the object and raced toward the west, right over me, so i assumed it had left. so i looked back at the same spot and observed the object was still there in it's emerald form. so it would appear there were two objects involved. that object then turned the lights off, and raced toward the west in the direction of the other object. i could not believe my eyes, and everything i am sharing here is 100% true. the whole experience lasted about twenty minutes. when the black objects moved west, they moved faster than any normal aircraft. they were black / dark, and were high-up, so it was difficult to see them clearly, but i would assume they were either a saucer shape, boomerang, or triangular. it's possible the object changed shape, but this is speculation. during the event, i asked the object to come closer, and it did move a little in my direction. i feel like this object was conscious of me. this is the third sighting in less than two weeks. something is going on here in shasta county. i didn't have my camera (of course), but ran home, cancelled my local bus trip, and told my neighbor about it. i was so emotionally moved i almost wept. the object did not seem like it was of this earth. i know what planes, helicopters, jets, and drones are. this object was in a whole other class.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Emerald orb pulsating in same spot for several minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my sofa watching t.V. on july 16, 2016 at 10:14 p.M. i glanced out my window toward the north east and noticed what i first thought was an airplane. then i noticed several red and blue lights which appeared to be rotating and pulsating at time same time from lift to right. then i realized it couldn't be an airplane. i really couldn't be sure if the object was actually moving. after about 4 seconds the object disappeared as i was looking at it. i know it didn't disappear into the clouds, because their were no clouds in the sky at the time. it was there then it was gone in a flash. very exciting to witness.
content.summary: Ufo had red and blue rotating pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription:
7/16/16  9:18pm, it was still light out. my husband and i were on our deck enjoying the evening and it was very peaceful. we both remarked about that. it was a perfectly clear sky with no wind. at first i said to him, look here comes a plane, i had just saw it through the the trees, it was on a typical plane flight path from cvg airport. but as it cleared the trees we saw that it wasn't a jetliner. we saw a red missile / bullet shaped object flying at about the same altitude as a airliner coming from the airport. it also had what looked like a propeller on backend. there was no sound at all. traveled sw to se at about 45* up from the horizon. at first it was flying like it might have been a weird plane or a helicopter. but then it would slow down and my husband said maybe it's a drone because it would just hover for a second or two. then we watched as it would spin, go up, down, loop. periodically it would have fire moving through it. going from front to back over and over again. the fire would stop and then it would do more acrobatics and it would have the fire in it again. we watched it for about 8 minutes, first with our naked eyes then i got the binoculars and watched it until we could not see it anymore, because it went so high into the sky. there were no other planes in the sky before, during or after, until about 20 minutes later i saw a plane far in the distance. 
we have no idea what it could have been. my husband said we should report it to mufon. we weren't scared, it was just so weird.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red missile/bullet shaped object with a propeller/turbine on backend. traveled sw to se. it would spin, go up, down, loop. had fire moving through it.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were in my moms backyard and my brother and i looked up in the sky at the same time and noticed a bright white light moving quite fast and all of a sudden it went really bright for a few seconds. then continued and then went brighter white again. all of a sudden it very sharply turned right and then disappeared into the sky! wow, i can't believe what we saw!
content.summary: Was brightly glowing white, flew in fast straight path, went brighter white for few sec., repeated x2, made sharp right turn then continued east

content.detailedDescription: At old orchard beach maine, was watching a fireworks display and at the end as people were leaving i looked up and noticed a red light out over the ocean and it wasnt moving then it started to move then it had a white light on it and it continued to move across the sky then changed direction then blinked off
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At the end of a fireworks display i noticed a light that flashed and hovered then started moving before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I where stay in my backyard and the brilliant light capture my attention
over my house and stay stationary in the same spot like a 30 - 40 minutes after this the light was ascending and disappearing.
content.summary: Brilliant and unusuall stationary light over my house

content.detailedDescription: A storm was rolling in and i looked in the sky and saw what appeared to be a triangle within the storm clouds.  there is storm cloud type beam coming from the upper top of the triangle.  i wanted to post to see if anyone else sees what i saw.  it just looked odd to me so took a pic of it to share.  it could just be storm clouds but i've never seen a triangle in a storm cloud.
content.summary: A triangle behind the storm clouds

content.detailedDescription: While outside i observed a very high bright light traveling from the sw heading ne.At 1st i believed it to be a satellite or the space station which i have observed in the past until the craft made a hard turn to the right followed by a hard u turn to the left heading at last view heading nw.It was much higher then the broken clouds in the area as well as an airplane which was also in the sky at the time.I've have never seen a craft move so fast or make the turns it did in all my life! much to high to be a drone or a normal air craft.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: We were hanging out around the pool when a very bright light caught my attention. 3-4 of us saw it. the light was at approx. 1:00 in the clear blue sky. it went 3/4 way across the sky, then suddenly reversed, and travelled back along the same path. it moved very deliberately, but not all that fast. it did move like a drone might, but it did not (to my eyes), look like one. no sound, and there was no way to judge its size. please let me know what you think.
content.summary: A brilliant light travelled across the sky, reversed and travelled back along the same path.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving then i noticed it hovering above me
content.summary: Inedentified object hovering

content.detailedDescription: walked out front door to get something from my car looking up and saw what i first thought was a plan on fire but soon i realized it was not a plane but an orb.Then another went by.Then realized 3 or 4 had already gone by before them. they were completely silent. they were moving horizontally from my right to left to fast to be a balloon. i started getting goose bumps and i teared up. i looked to the left to see if another one was coming. but did not see anymore so when i looked back to my left i realized that i had just caught the last 2 out of 5 or 6. they were not in a perfect line but they were staggered. they were all the same fire orange. when i realized that there was a group of them i ran into the house and went up stairs to tell my husband so he could look out the window.I was shaking and tearing but it was to late they had all gone by behind the trees by the. i then when into my 19 year old daughters room to tell her what happened she wanted me to call the police.
content.summary: Saw one orbe then another when i reaized 4 more were in the lead of the 2 i saw up close.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting looking towards orion and the big dipper at night, we saw a white circle appear, in roughly the direction of alderbaran - the circle grew evenly for about 3 seconds, then an object came out of the circle and flew off to the right (as we were looking) horizontally...

as the object flew to the right, the circle shrunk and disappeared again, and the object could still be seen for another couple of minutes util it was too far away....
content.summary: White 'portal' type object appeared in the sky, and ejected a small object - horizontally

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out of window making a drink, saw glowing orange orb, with no flashing lights moving smoothly ne to n out of my kitchen window...

went to grab my phone for a photo, but it had disappeared behind the trees/other houses...
content.summary: Looking out of window making a drink, saw glowing orange orb, with no flashing lights moving smoothly ne to n
